channel.title: Saas UI
channel.description: Advanced UI components for SaaS products.

item.title: Professionally crafted Chakra UI components
item.description: Professionally crafted Chakra UI components that help you build intuitive React apps with speed.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Introduction
item.description: An advanced component library built with Chakra UI for building high quality SaaS products at speed.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: How to get up and running quickly with Saas UI.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Core overview
item.description: An advanced component library built on Chakra UI for building high quality SaaS products at speed.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Design Principles
item.description: Principles that keep your code and UX consistent
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: useCollapse
item.description: React hook that helps creating accesssible Collapse components.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: useLocalStorage
item.description: React hook to manage localStorage
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Pro
item.description: A modern clean dashboard ui that your customers will love.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Project structure
item.description: How to find your way in the project.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: BulkActions
item.description: A set of actions to perform on one or more selected items.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: DataGrid
item.description: A advanced data table component that supports sorting, selections, filters and pagination.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Filters
item.description: Intuitive data filtering components.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: AuthProvider
item.description: Authentication state management and hooks.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Auth
item.description: Ready to use authentication forms.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Command
item.description: A command is used to show which key or combination of keys performs a given action.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: DataTable
item.description: A basic data table component that supports sorting and selections.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Divider
item.description: Dividers are used to visually separate content in a list or group.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: EmptyState
item.description: Display actionable feedback when no data is available.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: List
item.description: A component used to display collections of data in a consistent manner.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Persona
item.description: A component that represents a person and their status.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Property
item.description: A component used to show key/value data in a consistent manner.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Benefits Modal
item.description: A benefits modal is used to show case important features or product updates.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Tour Dialog
item.description: A tour dialog is used convey benefits or instructions for a new features.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Tour
item.description: Introduce people to new features using multi-step tours.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Banner
item.description: Banners are used to communicate accouncements and important information.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Loader
item.description: A loading indicator that fills it's parent.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: NProgress
item.description: Show feedback when switching pages and content is loading in the background.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Snackbar
item.description: The snackbar component is used to give feedback after certain actions.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: ArrayField
item.description: Form field component to handle array type values.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: AutoForm
item.description: Automatically render forms based on a schema.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Button
item.description: Button component is used to trigger an action or event, such as submitting a form, opening a Dialog, canceling an action, or performing a delete operation.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Field
item.description: A controlled form field component.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: FormLayout
item.description: Arrange fields in a form with consistant spacing and positioning.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Form
item.description: Create fully functional React forms with just a few lines of code.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: ObjectField
item.description: Form field component to handle object type values.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: PasswordInput
item.description: A password input type component
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: SearchInput
item.description: A search input type component.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Select
item.description: A custom select component.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: StepForm
item.description: Create multi-step React forms with just a few lines of code.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: App Shell
item.description: The App Shell defines the main structure of your app.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Card
item.description: Cards can be used to provide easy scannable information and details.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Page
item.description: Page makes it easy to implement consistent page layouts throughout your app.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Section
item.description: Split content into multiple easily scannable sections.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Toolbar
item.description: A container for grouping a set of controls, like buttons, toggles or menus.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Hotkeys
item.description: Keyboard shortcuts for modern apps
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Sidebar
item.description: Commonly used as the primary navigation.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Stepper
item.description: Indicate progress through numbered steps in multi-step workflows.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Form Dialog
item.description: A modal dialog that renders a form.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Menu Dialog
item.description: A list of menu options inside a modal dialog.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Modals manager
item.description: Manage different types of modals with a single easy to use hook.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: ResponsiveMenu
item.description: A mobile friendly Menu component.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Br
item.description: Br is used to render new lines in paragraphs of text.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Text
item.description: Text is the used to render text and paragraphs within an interface.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Heading
item.description: Headings are used for rendering headlines.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Text
item.description: Text is the used to render text and paragraphs within an interface.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: ErrorBoundary
item.description: A container component that catches errors and displays a fallback UI.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Feature Flags
item.description: Expose features to your users using feature flags.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: ResizeBox
item.description: Utility hook and component to create resizable panels.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Web3Address
item.description: Display Web3 addresses in a more readable format.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)
